scripts.zk:setup: npx snarkjs groth16 setup circuits/deposit.r1cs setup/pot12_0001.ptau circuits/deposit_0000.zkey && npx snarkjs zkey contribute circuits/deposit_0000.zkey circuits/deposit_final.zkey --name="My Contribution" -v -e="random entropy"
scripts.zk:verify-keys: npx snarkjs zkey verify circuits/deposit.r1cs setup/pot12_0001.ptau circuits/deposit_final.zkey
scripts.zk:gen-verifier: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier circuits/deposit_final.zkey contracts/Verifier.sol
scripts.zk:full-setup: pnpm zk:compile && pnpm zk:setup && pnpm zk:verify-keys && pnpm zk:gen-verifier
scripts.zk:prove: npx snarkjs wtns calculate circuits/deposit_js/deposit.wasm input.json witness.wtns && npx snarkjs groth16 prove circuits/deposit_final.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.zk:verify-proof: npx snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
